extDescription.message: Find out about the location, ip address, timezone, currency and other information about the websites you visit!

errorText.message: There was an error. We are sorry.
errorText.description: Error text when data couldn't be loaded.

loadingText.description: Text when data is being loaded.

saveText.description: Text when a form can be saved.

popup_hoverTitle_onionService.description: User hovers over icon on an onion service.

popup_localHostPage_text.message: This is your PC. Welcome home.
popup_localHostPage_text.description: User is on an offline-browser site.

popup_onionPage_text.message: This is an onion service. You can't find out it's location.
popup_onionPage_text.description: User is on an Onion service. These are server, whose location can't be determined.

popup_countryFlag_image_alt.description: Alternative image description text for country flag

popup_clock_yourTime.description: Text of clock of user's time

popup_clock_serverTime.description: Text of clock of server's time

popup_information_ipAddress.description: Title of information box of server's ip address.

popup_information_organisation.description: Title of information box of the server's internet organisation.

popup_information_isp.description: Title of information box of the server's internet service provider.

popup_information_timezone.description: Title of information box of the server's country timezone.

popup_information_currency.description: Title of information box of the server's country currency.

popup_create_bug_report.description: Button which allows to copy a report which can be pasted in a bug report.

options_storageNotAllowed.message: You didn't grant the <storage> permisssion. Please enable it to use settings.
